name: Endless Bullet Heaven
description:
Enjoy this benchmark challenge in bullet avoidance!

In this game, you move using just the mouse to avoid any and all projectiles that come your way. After a few seconds of surviving the bullet pattern, a target will appear. Either wait out the attack timer or click the target to gain more score and advance the bullet pattern to a new, randomly selected one. Once you've taken too many hits, the game will be over and if a high score is achieved, it will be saved automatically.



Featuring:
  • A unique and charming protagonist, with lore planned to be included eventually!
  • 20+ Fully unique bullet patterns
  • Bullet patterns may be given slight variations or modifiers
  • Try to get the best score you can!

Note: Game is currently in a very early state and should be updated frequently up to and after release!
